Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
full-size \full-size\ adj. Being of the same size as an original.
Syn: life-size, life-sized. [WordNet 1.5]
full-size adj : being of the same size as an original; "a life-size sculpture" [syn: {life-size}, {lifesize}, {life-sized}]
